Description: Otherwordly pleasure and dangerous desire stalk the night as immortal creatures, ravenous and unforgiving, take their prey to the brink of ecstasy and fear, in this sensual collection of stories from four best-selling authors--Laurell K. Hamilton, MaryJanice Davidson, Eileen Wilks, and Rebecca York. Original..
